mapper.select: select a.u_id as uId, b.o_value as oValue, a.o_addtion as oAddtion, c.u_active_time as uActiveTime, c.u_name as uName from submit a left join options b on a.o_id=b.o_id left join users c on a.u_id=c.u_id where a.n_id = #{nId}
select o_value as name, count(1) as value from submit a left join options b on a.o_id = b.o_id where a.n_id = #{nId} group by o_value order by value desc
